Detailed Description

RotationMatrixAboutY This object implements specific operations related to the rotation matrix about the Y-axis:

The object implements optimized operators for multiplication with the following matrix types: Matrix3d, RotationMatrix, RotationMatrixAboutX

Matrix3d metapod::Spatial::RotationMatrixAboutY::operator* ( const Matrix3d &  A) const [inline]

Optimized multiplication of the rotation matrix with a general 3x3 matrix.

The total number of operations is 12m + 6a.
Matrix3d = RotationMatrixAboutY * Matrix3d

References m_c, and m_s.

RotationMatrix metapod::Spatial::RotationMatrixAboutY::operator* ( const RotationMatrix &  aRM) const [inline]

Optimized multiplication of the rotation matrix with a general 3x3 matrix.

The total number of operations is 12m + 6a.
RotationMatrix = RotationMatrixAboutY * RotationMatrix
